column54: Either the parent/guardian name must be on the residency documents or if the parent/guardian lives with another adult who is named on the residency documents, the parent/guardian must upload a signed letter from the person named on the residency documents stating that the parent/guardian lives at that same address.   If uploading a letter, parent/guardian must also upload acceptable proofs of residency in resident’s name and a photo of the resident's ID.
